title: Point Breeze  SPACIOUS STUDIO
description:
Cozy  Unit. Pets Friendly. Roof Deck!
The Breeze was once a historic school building built in 1893 which is now apart of the National Register of Historic Places. Being recently remodeled but keeping some of its historic charm, there are now plenty of spacious studio, one-, and two-, bedroom apartments.
Some of the unique perks include original hardwood floors (some apartments), repurposed school cabinets, and beautifully crafted doors and entryways.
This building also offers the most amazing view of Center City from the rooftop deck, where you can relax and is perfect for entertaining.
Tenants are responsible for paying for electric.
Shared laundry on each floor.
Pets under 30lbs are allowed and there is a $300 non-refundable pet fee.
Parking has a waitlist.

+Only 2 months of rent to move in.
+$60 application fee (First month and security deposit) .

title: Unique opportunity to rent a historic Society Hill townhouse!
description: Unique opportunity to rent a historic Society Hill townhouse with parking and garden! Welcome to 600 Spruce Street, a regal townhouse just steps from Washington Square Park. Listed on the Philadelphia Register of Historic places, this house is a storied masterpiece spanning 4,225 sq ft across 4 stories. Features include 5 large bedrooms, including a full floor master suite, 3.5 baths, a finished lower level, and a lovely backyard garden and patio. Additionally, its 3 outward facing exposures cultivate brilliant natural light throughout, truly highlighting its original features like beautiful marble fireplaces and crown moldings. Its perfect location adds even more value. Society Hill is home to many exceptional restaurants, boutiques, historic attractions, Penn's Landing as well as Jefferson and Pennsylvania Hospitals. Don't miss your chance to experience this distinguished house in one of Philadelphia s most coveted locations. Owner is open to 1,2 or 3 year lease.

title: Charming Townhouse in Philly with Garage and Security System!
description:
Welcome to 725 S 5th St , Philadelphia, PA! This beautifully maintained townhouse in the heart of town can be your next home.
As you enter, you'll be greeted by the spacious vaulted-ceiling den with beautiful hardwood floors and a cozy fireplace. The convenient pass-through leads to the large eat-in kitchen, complete with all appliances and a handy island for extra prep space.
Just off the kitchen, you'll find a huge laundry room with a washer and dryer, as well as plenty of storage. The townhouse also features two guest bedrooms with ample closet space, and a big Master Suite with a dual sink vanity, tub and shower, and a large walk-in closet.
Relax on the covered deck that overlooks the privacy-fenced back yard. The townhouse also includes a two-car garage and plenty of parking spaces in the driveway.
For added peace of mind, a security alarm system is included. Tenants are responsible for paying for gas, electric, and water.
Don't miss out on the opportunity to make this beautiful townhouse your new home.

title: This Stunning Corner and Rare Condo That is a Fully Renovated Find
description:
This stunning corner and rare condo that is a fully renovated find, with many luxurious upgrades such as quartz countertops and luxury flooring throughout is in the heart of Washington Square. Everything in this unit is brand new, from the designer kitchen with stainless steel appliances to the upgraded bathroom, interior lighting, custom window treatments, and professionally painted interiors. This 2 bedroom, 1 bath unit provides spacious living in the heart of vibrant Washington Sq West, with nearby theaters, fine dining, coffee shops, top medical centers, idyllic parks, and myriad shopping options that offer a high quality, convenient standard of living. With no other tenants on the floor, this special unit is very private. Upon entering, the main living space is airy and open, with lots of natural light from a wall of windows at the front and side, and window treatments that can be raised or lowered for added privacy. The entire condo features modern, engineered hardwood floors. The tasteful kitchen offers upgraded gray cabinetry, white quartz waterfall counters, stainless steel appliances, Calacatta tile backsplash, deep double sinks, under cabinet hidden outlets, a large appliance cubby, pantry, an extended peninsula with pendant lighting, and comfortable seating for two or more. The primary master suite features a large bedroom, a walk-in closet, and a luxurious full bathroom with designer tile, a glass-enclosed shower, and dual access pocket doors. The second bedroom also has a walk-in closet. The entry hall includes multiple closets for coats, a washer/ dryer hook-up space, an electric water heater, and the central HVAC. FURNISHED options available. ** Prices subject to change on daily basis *

title: Discover this charming property in Philadelphia!!
description:
Center City West is a neighborhood within Center City, the downtown district of Philadelphia. This urban hub is one of Philadelphia's most desirable neighborhoods. The Center City West neighborhood encompasses some of the city's biggest attractions including the shopping, financial, and museum districts. It attracts its residents by not only hosting some of the city's leading institutions of art, science, and history, but also with its upscale restaurants and a booming nightlife. The options are endless: Laugh tears of joy at the Helium Comedy Club, have a shopping spree at the Shops at Liberty Place, or get a spectacular panoramic view 57 stories above the ground at the One Liberty Observation Deck. Nearby Rittenhouse Square is a popular spot for festivals and farmers markets while the Schuylkill Banks has excellent riverside running and biking trails with a view.
105 S 18th Street S #5C

description:
This charming trinity style home in the heart of Philadelphia's vibrant Bella Vista neighborhood is now available for rent. title: This rarely found one bedroom plus den condo with a full-size PRIVATE
description: This rarely found one bedroom plus den condo with a full-size PRIVATE ROOF DECK in a convenient Graduate Hospital location checks all the boxes. This beautifully maintained condo features an open concept living and kitchen area with a chic industrial vibe courtesy of exposed ductwork, painted brick accent wall and modern-style kitchen. The kitchen features sleek white cabinetry accented by a muted aquamarine penny tile backsplash and stainless-steel appliances. A sizeable island provides prep space for cooking meals at home and has an elevated breakfast bar for casual dining. Bamboo flooring flows throughout the kitchen, living and bedroom areas, unifying the spaces. Right off the living area is a smaller rear deck (perfect for a container garden) with stairs to access the private roof deck. Not only does this roof deck have panoramic, unobstructed Philly skyline views, it is also spacious enough to accommodate large-scale deck furniture. It truly functions as a second living space and with recent mild temperatures you can keep the outdoor living going into the colder months! Back inside the bedroom has two large windows for lots of light and a cool exposed brick accent wall. Just off of the bedroom is the den, which is currently set-up as the walk-in closet of your dreams.

title: Perfect Studio Waiting for You
description: Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient.
